member.name: T:Penguin.Cms.Entities.UserAuditableEntity
member.summary: Base class for any entity that should have all changes logged along with identifying information of the person that made those changes

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Entities.UserAuditableEntity.Creator
member.summary: The Guid of the user that created the object

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Entities.UserAuditableEntity.Deleter
member.summary: The Guid of the user that deleted the object

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Entities.UserAuditableEntity.IPCreated
member.summary: The IP address of the user that created the object

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Entities.UserAuditableEntity.IPDeleted
member.summary: The IP Address of the user that deleted the object

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Entities.UserAuditableEntity.IPModified
member.summary: The IP Address of the last user to make changes to the object

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Entities.UserAuditableEntity.LastModifier
member.summary: The Guid of the last user to make changes to the object
